issue.title: [CF 422] Icon tooltip option
issue.body:
I'm trying to add an item tooltip to the icon. So I can more efficiently track items on the AH.

http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/forum/general/30778-item-on-auction-house/#p1

Link above shows the current efficient of AH tracking.


> Posted by CurseForge user Theosco | Imported from CurseForge issue #422 | Raw

comments.body:
You want the tooltip of the item that is being tracked to be displayed when you hover over the icon? This whole auction tracking thing seems to be a bit outside the realm of what TMW is intended to do - auctions have very little to do with combat. The currency conditions are about as far as I am willing to go - they are at least a part of raiding and PvP.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
